meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Steve Berman Gary Myers Jay Wish Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1182.

td.p: Steve Berman, a film executive from Santa Monica, California
Gary Myers, an attorney from Riverside, California
Jay Wish, a physician from Shaker Heights, Ohio (whose 1-day cash winnings total $7,801)

tr.td: STARTS WITH "A"
MEN'S COLOGNE
PHYSICAL SCIENCE
CELEBRITY QUOTES
RECORD ALBUM COVERS
